original_text: What? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in? or despise ye the church of God, and shame them that have not? what shall I say to you? shall I praise you in this? I praise you not.
korean_text: 너희가 먹고 마실 집이 없느냐 너희가 하나님의 교회를 업신여기고 빈궁한 자들을 부끄럽게 하느냐 내가 너희에게 무슨 말을 하랴 너희를 칭찬하랴 이것으로 칭찬하지 않노라

sentences.original_text: What? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in?
sentences.korean_translation: 무엇이냐? 너희는 먹고 마실 집이 없느냐?

sentences.original_text: or despise ye the church of God,
and shame them that have not?
what shall I say to you?
shall I praise you in this?
